name: GO! GO! Gagarin!
description:
Based on the totally true story of that one time Yuri Gagarin, the first male homo sapien in space, had to dodge asteroids on his trip around the universe... which totally, 100% DID (not) happen.

Be a comrade and have a play!

If you ask I will provide the means of production.

Mobile

The menus are all touch accessible. But the controls on mobile aren't really clear - in fact they're not even marked at all in game! :O

These are the appropriate (yes appropriate) places you can touch, and what happens when you do :)
